scripts.build: curl -O https://storage.googleapis.com/flutter_infra_release/releases/stable/linux/flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && tar xf flutter_linux_3.24.5-stable.tar.xz && export PUB_CACHE=./.pub-cache && git config --global --add safe.directory '*' && ./flutter/bin/flutter config --enable-web --no-analytics && ./flutter/bin/flutter build web --release --base-href=/
